title: Error when adding card
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enters credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters card information
AND the user taps ‘add card’
AND there is an issue with the entry
custom_expected: THEN the user will be hit with the message ‘Sorry, we’re having problems adding this card right now. Please review the information or use a different card’

title: Selecting a Credit Card enables this as the default Credit Card
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously entered credit cards into the payment methods screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Payment methods screen
AND the user taps a Credit Card
custom_expected: THEN this selected credit card becomes the default payment option

title: Default Credit Card has checkmark
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously entered credit cards into the payment methods screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Payment methods screen
AND the user taps a Credit Card
custom_expected:
THEN this selected credit card becomes the default payment option
AND a checkmark will display next to this credit card

title: Carts automatically display the default credit card as default payment method
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the the user selected a Credit Card from the wallet
AND this selected credit card became the default payment option
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the shopping cart
AND views the payment tab
custom_expected: THEN user will see the previously selected credit card as the default payment option

title: Swipe to delete credit card option displays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes on the credit card icon
custom_expected: THEN the option to delete will display

title: Swipe to delete credit card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
AND the user swipes on the credit card icon
custom_steps:
WHEN the option to delete displays
AND the user taps OK
custom_expected: THEN the credit card will be deleted from the payment methods screen

title: Edit mode to display delete icons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
custom_expected: THEN the Delete icon will display next to the credit cards that are removable

title: Edit mode to delete a credit card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
AND taps the remove icon
AND confirms removal
custom_expected: THEN the credit card will no longer be available on the payment methods screen

title: ADD CARD button should be hidden/disappear when in edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Add Card’ button will become hidden

title: ADD CARD button reappears when leaving edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
AND taps ‘Done’
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Add Card’ button will reappear

title: Tapping done without deleting card does not remove CC from file
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has previously added a few credit cards to the payment methods screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
AND taps the DONE button without removing any credit cards
custom_expected: THEN the credit cards will remain preserved in the payment methods screen

title: RCR doesn’t have a delete option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has RCR as an option of payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to remove RCR from the payment methods screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be unsuccessful
AND RCR will always remain as a payment method

title: Apply Pay doesn’t have delete option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has Apple Pay as an option of payment
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to remove Apple Pay from the payment methods screen
THEN the user will be unsuccessful
custom_expected: AND Apple Pay will always remain as a payment method

title: Payment Method button navigates user to the Payment Method screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the Payment section
AND the user taps the ‘Payment Methods’ button
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the Order History screen

title: Payment Methods is the Header on the screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Payment Methods’ from the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the header on the screen will display as ‘Payment Methods’

title: Edit button is not tappable if there are no cards available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Payment Methods’ from the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
AND the user has NOT previously added a Credit/Debit card to the payment methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Edit’ will be not be tappable

title: Edit button is available is there is at least one card available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Payment Methods’ from the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
AND the user has previously added a Credit/Debit card to the payment methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Edit’ will be available and tappable

title: Back button is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Payment Methods’ from the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Back’ button will be available

title: Back button navigates user back to previous screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Payment Methods’ from the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
AND the user taps ‘back’
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated back to the previous screen

title: Apple Pay is always available as a payment method
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps Payment Methods from the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN ‘Apple Pay’ is always an option available

title: ‘Add Card’ button is available
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps Payment Methods from the home screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the the ‘Add Card’ button is available to the user

title: Tapping ‘Add Card’ navigates user to Add Card Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Add Credit Card from Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen

title: First Name/ Middle Initial field is available on the Add Card screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Add Card’ from payment methods
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘First Name is an available field

title: Last Name field is available on the Add Card screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Add Card’ from payment methods
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Last Initial’ is an available field

title: Card Number field is available on the Add Card screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Add Card’ from payment methods
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Card Number’ is an available field

title: Expiration Date field is available on the Add Card screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Add Card’ from payment methods
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Expiration Date’ is an available field

title: Zip Code field is available on the Add Card screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps ‘Add Card’ from payment methods
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Add Credit Card screen
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Zip Code’ is an available field

title: Keyboard is activated by tapping text box for X section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Add Credit Card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps any text box for any field
custom_expected: THEN the keyboard will activate

title: Keyboard is dismissed via tapping off the filling section or a Done button on the keyboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Add Credit Card screen
AND the user has activated the keyboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Done’
custom_expected: THEN the keyboard will be ‘dismissed’

title: Application checks to see if credit card information is valid
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enters credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Add card’
custom_expected: THEN the app will check to see if this card is valid

title: Information header text is displayed in red when information is incorrect
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enters credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters incorrect/ incomplete information
custom_expected: THEN the information header will display in red

title: Expiration date: User cannot select dates in the past
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters an expiration date in the past
custom_expected: THEN the information header will display in red

title: SCS/CCV - Require 3/4 digits
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to add the card without entering the security code
custom_expected:
THEN the ‘add card’ button will not become enabled
AND the user will be required to enter the security code

title: Cursor jumps to next text input when adding a credit card
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Add Card screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is entering their credit card information
AND the user enters the first few digits and completes that text field
custom_expected: THEN the cursor will automatically jump to the next text field

title: Card # is not masked at any point.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is entering the card number
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to see each digit
AND the card number is not masked

title: CVV # is mask when numbers are entered.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the CVV number
AND taps another field
custom_expected: THEN the CVV number becomes masked

title: Correct icon for card appears when entering card Number.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the card number
custom_expected: THEN the correct card icon appears

title: Add Card button becomes active once all fields are satisfied
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user completes entry of the credit card information
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Add Card’ button becomes active

title: Add Card button is not active if any field is not satisfied
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is entering credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user does not complete entry of the credit card information
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Add Card’ button will not be active

title: Card is successfully added when attempting to add valid card
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enters credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters valid card information
AND the user taps ‘add card'
custom_expected: THEN the card will be successfully added

title: User receives error when attempting to add invalid card
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user enters credit card information to the Add Credit card screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters invalid card information
AND the user taps ‘add card'
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an error message
AND the card will not be successfully added

title: eCash displays in Payment Methods screen after linking account with eCash
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has linked their account to their eCash account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN ‘eCash’ will be available as a payment method

title: eCash does not display in Payment Methods screen if account is not linked with eCash
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not linked their account to their eCash account
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Payment Methods screen
custom_expected: THEN ‘eCash’ will not be available as a payment method

title: Canceling order for fortress via terminal and return payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order
AND the user used their fortress eCash to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to that order on the terminal
AND the user cancels the order
custom_expected: THEN the users fortress account is reimbursed with the amount used

title: Cancel button for Error message during checkout issue with eCash payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has eCash as the payment method and is ready to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
AND there is an issue during submission
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the error message ‘Sorry, there was a problem with the credit card/payment method you selected’ 
AND the ‘Cancel’ button will be available
AND tapping cancel cancels out the process 
AND navigates the user back to the cart

title: Change Payment button for Error message during checkout issue with eCash payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has eCash as the payment method and is ready to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
AND there is an issue during submission
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the error message ‘Sorry, there was a problem with the credit card/payment method you selected’ 
AND the ‘Change Payment’ button will be available
AND tapping Change Payment navigates user to the payment selections screen

title: Spinner spins when ‘Place Order’ button is tapped
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has the payment method selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected: THEN a spinner will spin indicating that something is occuring

title: Spinner spins when tapping ‘Link My Account’ from the root menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps eCash
AND taps Link my Account
custom_expected: THEN the spinner will spin indicating to the user that something is occuring

title: Spinner spins when tapping ‘cancel’ on an already placed order via eCash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has placed an order
AND the user used their fortress eCash to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to that order
AND the user cancels the order
custom_expected: THEN the spinner will spin indicating that something is occurring
